title: Full Circle: The Love of a Lifetime
description: This book contains mature themes and content, including explicit scenes. Awarded Finalist in the screenplay adaptation category in the Page Turner international book awards, Full Circle takes you from first love to first apartment, country life, the big city, marriage, divorce, the boardroom, the bedroom, motherhood and quirky friends.Get ready to embark on a journey filled with heartwarming moments, humor, and steamy scenes. Stacie's life takes her from the small town of rural Alberta to the big city of Calgary, with a stop in the charming tourist town of Banff.Through heartbreak and loss, Stacie finds the strength to trust again and rediscover her passions.With witty dialogue and nostalgia, this coming-of-age story will have you laughing, crying, and cheering for Stacie as she navigates the ups and downs of life.From finding the love of her life to becoming a single mother, Stacie proves that it's never too late to start over and find happiness.
author: Buffy Eau Claire
